scripts.serve:dev: echo "Trying to serve the development environment..." && webpack-dev-server -d --config webpack.serve.dev.config.js
scripts.serve:dev:dashboard: echo "Trying to serve the development environment with dashboard visualization..." && webpack-dashboard -- webpack-dev-server -d --config webpack.serve.dev.config.js
scripts.serve:prod: echo "Trying to serve the production environment..." && http-server --proxy http://localhost:8080? -o
scripts.build:dev: echo "Trying to build the application from the development environment..." && webpack --config webpack.build.dev.config.js
scripts.build:prod: echo "Trying to build the application from the production environment..." && webpack --config webpack.build.prod.config.js
scripts.doc:js: echo "Removing JavaScript documentation..." && rm -rfv scriptguide/ && jsdoc src -r -R ./src/SCRIPTGUIDE.md -d scriptguide
scripts.doc:css: echo "Removing style documentation..." && rm -rfv styleguide/ && kss --source src/ --homepage STYLEGUIDE.md --title residuall-unidades --css 'typography.scss'
scripts.rm:docs: echo "Removing all documentation folders..." && rm -rfv styleguide/ scriptguide/
scripts.clean: echo "Cleaning public/ directory and documentation folders..." && npm run rm:public && npm run rm:docs
